result.markdown: --- title: "Math 300Z" author: "Daniel Kaplan" date: "February 17, 2022" format: html: theme: cosmo --- ::: {.cell} ::: Math 300Z is the prototype for scheduled revisions to Math 300. The revisions apply only to Lessons 19 and up; the first 18 lessons come from Math 300. Lesson 19. the textbook is [*Lessons in Statistical Thinking*](https://dtkaplan.github.io/Lessons-in-statistical-thinking) ::: ::: {.column width="35%"} ::: :::: ## Software The POSIT.cloud workspaces will already have the packages installed. If you are running RStudio on your laptop (that is, not in a browser), the following command will install the packages. ```r install.packages(c("mosaic", "ggplot", "dplyr", "openintro", "moderndive", "nycflights13", "knitr")) # addition package for Math 300Z remotes::install_github("dtkaplan/math300") ``` - [A note on computing summaries of data](Student-notes/Student-notes-computing-summaries.html) ## First half of Math 300, Jan. and Feb. 2023 {#first-half} :::: columns ::: {.column width="65%"} For Lessons 1-18, the textbook is [*Statistical Inference via Data Science*](https://moderndive.com) ::: ::: {.column width="35%"} ![](www/moderndive-cover.png) ::: :::: **Data, graphics, wrangling** Reading: SIDS Chapters 1 through 4 1. Data with R 2. Scatterplots 3. Linegraphs, histograms, facets 4. Boxplots and barcharts 5. filter and summarize 6. group_by, mutate, arrange 7. join, select, rename, & top n 8. Importing data 9. Case study/review 10. GR1 (chapters 1-4) **Regression** Readings 11. SLR: Continuous x 12. SLR: Discrete x 13. SLR: Related topics 14. Multiple regression: Numerical & discrete 15. Multiple regression: Two numerical 16. Multiple regression: Related topics 17. Multiple regression: Conclusion/review 18. GR 2 (chapters 5-6)
